Hi all,
   I have written a SEWriterProcessor which writes the crawled cont=
ents in other format. As per the developers guide I included the class file=
 and the Processor.options file in a jar and placed the jar in the lib dire=
ctory. When I start Heritrix, the SEWriterProcessor is mentioned in the dro=
p-down menu in the modules for writer. However after adding the SEWriterPro=
cessor I get an error which says:

  An error occured
